mapper.select: select temp.*, wm.word_name from (select wp.paraphrase_id, wp.word_id, wp.paraphrase_english, wp.meaning_chinese, wp.character_id, wp.paraphrase_english_translate, wpsr.create_time from word_paraphrase_star_rel wpsr left join word_paraphrase wp on wpsr.paraphrase_id = wp.paraphrase_id where wpsr.list_id = #{listId} and wp.is_del = 'N') temp left join word_main wm on temp.word_id = wm.word_id order by temp.create_time desc

select temp.*, wm.word_name from (select wp.paraphrase_id, wp.word_id, wp.paraphrase_english, wp.meaning_chinese, wp.character_id, wp.paraphrase_english_translate, wpsr.create_time from word_paraphrase_star_rel wpsr left join word_paraphrase wp on wpsr.paraphrase_id = wp.paraphrase_id where wpsr.list_id = #{params.listId} and wpsr.is_remember = 0 and wp.is_del = 'N') temp left join word_main wm on temp.word_id = wm.word_id order by temp.create_time desc
